title: 【やさしい日本語】お酒(さけ)を 売(う)って ウクライナの 人(ひと)を 応援(おうえん)する
cleaned_sentences: [Easy Japanese] Sellers alcohol and support people in Ukrainians Ukrainian ambassador Russia attacks next door Ukraine, causing war.
Many people have died or lost their homes in Ukraine.
A company in Fukuoka City has decided to sell alcohol and support Ukrainians.
If you buy one bottle of alcohol, you will donate 100 yen to the Ukrainian embassy.
It is sold at the "Leganet" supermarket in Fukuoka City.
You can buy it at the Leganets at Tenjin, Menihama, Iikura, Minami Nagazumi and LaLaport Fukuoka.
The Ukrainian ambassador in Japan said, "I would be happy if many people drank alcohol to support me."
The original article is here Easy Japanese We deliver news translated into "easy Japanese" that is easy for foreigners and children to understand.
